! Title: Brian's entertainment site blocklist
! Description: Entertainment sites that are general time-wasters
! Homepage: https://github.com/b-turchyn/blocklists

duckduckgo.com##[data-domain*="facebook.com"]
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="facebook.com"])
facebook.com
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain*="imgur.com"]
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="imgur.com"])
imgur.com
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain*="instagram.com"]
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="instagram.com"])
instagram.com
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain*="reddit.com"]
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="reddit.com"])
reddit.com
duckduckgo.com##[data-domain*="twitter.com"]
google.*##.g:has(a[href*="twitter.com"])
twitter.com
